issue.title: Phase 9: Parameter Extensions (5 rules)
issue.body:
## Overview

Implement Lambda runtime and deployment file parameter validation.

## Rules (5)

| Rule | Description | Difficulty |
|------|-------------|------------|
| E2529 | SubscriptionFilters limit (2 per LogGroup) | Medium |
| E2530 | SnapStart runtime support validation | Medium |
| E2531 | Lambda runtime deprecation check | Medium |
| E2533 | Lambda runtime updatability check | Medium |
| E2900 | Deployment file parameters validation | Hard |

## Notes

- E2529-E2533 require Lambda runtime knowledge
- E2900 requires parsing separate deployment files

## Progress

After Phase 8: 105/265 rules (40%)
After this phase: 110/265 rules (42%)
